alert.note: Alert for Misty Fjords (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:05AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...GLACIER DAM LAKE RELEASE ONGOING FOR SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER... The Salmon River has been rising since Sunday due to rain and snow melt, but saw a sharper rate of rise on Tuesday of around half a foot every 6 hours, indicating that Summit Lake was draining. The water level on the Salmon River should crest Wednesday or Thursday, however inherent uncertainty in these events result in varying crest height and timing issues. The area most at risk for impact is near 9 mile along the Salmon River. Be aware of debris in the water. Very cold water will increase the threat of hypothermia. Please report any observed impacts to the National Weather Service in one of the following ways: From the website inws.ncep.noaa.gov/report, via social media by sending National Weather Service Juneau a message on Facebook or tweeting us @NWSJuneau, or email us at juneau.weather@noaa.gov.
